unnormalised: Smart meters, eh? Heard mixed reviews from my neighbours in Kochi. Some say their bills have jumped like crazy during Onam season, even though we hardly used AC. Others are happy, saving Rs. 500-600 a month. Is it really helping reduce wastage like they promised, or just another way for BESCOM to collect more? Uncle Sharma says his readings are off by 20 km! Maybe I should stick to good old biryani and candlelight.
